code:
flowchart TD
    Start([User Visits Website])  Landing[Landing Page]
    Landing  Browse{Browse Features?}
    Browse |Yes| Features[View Features & Info]
    Browse |No| Auth[Click Get Started/Sign In]
    Features  Auth
    
    Auth  GoogleAuth[Google OAuth Modal]
    GoogleAuth  GoogleConsent[Google Consent Screen]
    GoogleConsent  TokenReceive[Receive ID Token]
    
    TokenReceive  BackendVerify[Backend Verifies Token]
    BackendVerify  CreateSession[Create User Session]
    CreateSession  ReturnJWT[Return JWT + User Data]
    
    ReturnJWT  StoreLocal[Store in localStorage]
    StoreLocal  Dashboard[Redirect to Dashboard]
    
    Dashboard  DashboardView{Choose Action}
    
    DashboardView |Ask Question| Copilot[AI Copilot]
    DashboardView |View Process| MindMap[Mind Map]
    DashboardView |Upload Files| Upload[Document Upload]
    DashboardView |Review Tax| Calculate[Tax Calculation]
    DashboardView |Submit ITR| Submit[Submit to Blockchain]
    
    Copilot  CopilotChat[Chat Interface]
    CopilotChat  QuickActions[Quick Action Buttons]
    QuickActions  AIResponse[Receive AI Response]
    AIResponse  CopilotChat
    
    MindMap  ViewNodes[View Hierarchical Nodes]
    ViewNodes  ExpandNode[Click to Expand]
    ExpandNode  ViewDetails[View Detailed Info]
    ViewDetails  TrackProgress[Track Status]
    
    Upload  SelectFile[Select Document]
    SelectFile  AIExtract[AI Extracts Data]
    AIExtract  AutoFill[Auto-fill Forms]
    AutoFill  ReviewData[Review Extracted Data]
    
    Calculate  ViewIncome[View Income Breakdown]
    ViewIncome  ViewDeductions[Review Deductions]
    ViewDeductions  CompareRegime[Compare Tax Regimes]
    CompareRegime  FinalTax[See Tax Liability]
    FinalTax  RefundAmount[Check Refund]
    
    Submit  ReviewAll[Review All Information]
    ReviewAll  Validate[Validate Data]
    Validate  Blockchain[Submit to Blockchain]
    Blockchain  TxHash[Receive Transaction Hash]
    TxHash  DownloadPDF[Download Certificate]
    DownloadPDF  EVerify[e-Verify with OTP]
    EVerify  TrackRefund[Track Refund Status]
    
    TrackRefund  End([Process Complete])
    
    style Start fill:#e1f5ff
    style Dashboard fill:#e1f5ff
    style Copilot fill:#fff4e1
    style MindMap fill:#fff4e1
    style Upload fill:#fff4e1
    style Calculate fill:#fff4e1
    style Submit fill:#e8f5e9
    style End fill:#e8f5e9
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
